item.title: Coding help ( PLEASE HELP ME OUT HERE)
item.dc:creator: @Muck_Sticky Muck Sticky
item.description:
@Muck_Sticky wrote:

              [code]} else if (npcs[i].npcType == whatever npc you want) {
                    if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
                    {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("your name")) {
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "your name is ONLINE";
                        } else {
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "your name is OFFLINE";
                        }
                    }

[/code]
add that to npchandler.java

then add the npc npc to autospawn.cfg wherever you want…

Read full topic
